document_data.name: Yarth Stowage
document_data.mainbody: '''Yarth Stowage''' was storage facility found witin the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}}
document_data.Location: The compound was located in central Daggerford along [[Duke's Way]] just southeast of the market.
document_data.Description: Yarth Stowage was one of the larger buildings found in Daggerford. The building stood five stories tall. Each floor was partitioned into secure rooms measuring {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} on each side.
document_data.Defenses: In addition to the thick metal walls, the entire building was protected by a powerful ward that prevented anyone within the building from committing nefarious deeds.
document_data.History: Yarth Stowage was owned by the [[gnome]] [[Yarth]].
